data.ACTION_DELAY_MIN: Changes will be applied within {{delay_min}} minutes.
data.ACTION_DELAY_HOUR: Changes will be applied within {{delay_hour}} hours.
data.ACTION_DELAY_EMAIL: Changes will be applied within {{delay_email}} minutes.
data.ERROR_BOFH_CONNECTION: Could not connect to the database, please try again later.
data.ERROR_BOFH_ERROR: Error in the communication with the database, please try again later.
data.ERROR_BOFH_RESTARTED: The database has been restarted, please update the page or log on again.
data.EMPLOYEES_ONLY: This is not activated in this version.
data.LOGON_INTRO: This is a self service for making changes to your user account at TSD.
data.LOGON_OUTRO: Read about where is it safe to enter your username and password.
data.LOGON_BLOCKED: Too many logon attempts, you have been temporary blocked from this site
data.LOGON_TIMED_OUT: This session has timed out after a period of inactivity. Please log on again.
data.LOGON_CONTROL_FAILED: Due to safety reasons, you have to log on again.
data.LOGOUT_SECURITY: Due to safety reasons, you have been logged out. Please try again.
data.HOME_SPECIFIC_ACCOUNT: Please note that you can only make changes to the account {{username}}. If you need to make changes to another account, please log on with the appropriate username and password.
data.HOME_SHORTCUTS_MEMBERS: Add or remove members from your group(s)
data.HOME_ABOUT: This is a web based user interface you can use to view and modify some of the information concerning your electronic identity in TSD projects at the University of Oslo. For more information and help about data systems at UiO, please see IT-services at UiO.
data.PERSON_HOWTO_CHANGE: If the information provided on this page is incorrect, please use the guide at https://www.uio.no/english/about/contact/change-personal-information.html
data.PRIMARY_PERSON_INTRO: Here you can set what should be your primary affiliations at the person presentations at uio.no.
data.PRIMARY_PERSON_UPDATED: Your primary affiliation is updated. The change will be applied within a few hours.
data.PERSON_NAME_INTRO: Choose what of your registered names that should be shown in different systems at UiO, e.g. the personal presentation at uio.no. Note that your primary e-mail address might change due to this.
data.PERSON_NAME_CURRENT: Your current name is {{name}} and your primary address is: {{email}}.
data.ACCOUNT_OTHER_INFO: For information about your other accounts, please log on with the appropiate username and password.
data.ACCOUNT_PASSWORD_INTRO:
Change the password of the account you are logged on to. Please note that your password is personal and must never be shared with anyone else, not even the IT staff at UiO.

This is a summary of the requirements, see all password requirements when in doubt.

A password must:

  • Be at least 8 characters long
  • Contain characters from at least 3 of 4 of these categories:
    • Numbers
    • Lowercase letters
    • Uppercase letters
    • Other characters
The password must not:
  • Contain æ, ø or å
  • Contain words found in a dictionary
  • Resemble one of your previous set password

Note that it takes time before you can log in with your new password to all services at the University. It is advised to change the password at the very end of the working day.
data.ACCOUNT_PASSWORD_ERROR_MATCH: The new password does not match with the retype.
data.ACCOUNT_PASSWORD_MOREINFO: View more information about the username and password at UiO.
data.ACCOUNT_PRIMARY_INTRO:
If you have more than one account at UiO, one of the accounts is the primary account. Please be aware of the following:
  • Feide accepts only your primary account
  • Fronter (blyant.uio.no) accepts only your primary account
data.ACCOUNT_PRIMARY_ALREADY:
The active account ({{username}}) is already your primary account.
To make another account the primary, please log on with that account.
data.ACCOUNT_PRIMARY_SUCCESS: Your account {{username}} is now your primary account. It normally takes up to up to 2 hours before changes are applied.
data.ACCOUNT_PRIMARY_FAILED: The system could not change your primary account, please contact your local IT support service or Houston
data.PRINTING_MOREINFO_PAY: To pay for more prints, please log on to StudentWeb at UiO.
data.PRINTING_MOREINFO_PRICES: For more information about the printout prices, see copy fee at UiO.
data.PRINTING_MOREINFO_PRINTING: For more information about printing and printers, please visit the page for printing services at UiO
data.PRINTING_HISTORY_EMPTY: Found no quota history for given period. You may need to extend the range.
data.EMAIL_INFO_NO_ACCOUNT: This user account does not have an email account
data.EMAIL_INFO_MORE_INFO: For more information about UiOs e-mail system please see the e-mail help pages.
data.EMAIL_DEL_INTRO: Are you sure you want to delete the address {{address}}? You will not be able to receive e-mail sent to this address anymore.
data.EMAIL_DEL_INVALID_ADDR: The given address could not be deleted
data.EMAIL_DEL_SUCCESS: The e-mail address {{address}} was successfully deleted
data.EMAIL_DEL_FAILED: The e-mail address {{address}} could not be deleted
data.EMAIL_SPAM_INTRO: These settings are applied before your e-mails are delivered to your mailbox. For more information please see USIT's page about spam.
data.EMAIL_SPAM_ACTION_SPAMFOLDER: Deliver spam to a separate folder
data.EMAIL_SPAM_ACTION_NOACTION: Deliver spam just like legitimate email
data.EMAIL_SPAM_LEVEL_MOST_SPAM: Filter most emails that looks like spam
data.EMAIL_SPAM_LEVEL_STANDARD_SPAM: Only filter email that obviously is spam
data.EMAIL_SPAM_LEVEL_NO_FILTER: No email will be filtered as spam
data.EMAIL_SPAM_RULE_ACTION_REQUIRED: Please choose what to do with your spam
data.EMAIL_FILTER_INTRO: Additional spam settings are extra tools for decreasing the amount of spam you receive. Remember to also set your standard spam settings. For more information please see USIT's page about spam.
data.EMAIL_FILTER_UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your additional spam settings have been updated
data.EMAIL_TRIPNOTE_INTRO: Out of office messages (vacation messages) are automatic replies to e-mails sent to you in a set period of time. Each sender will receive the message only once within a period of 7 days. For more information please see USIT's page about out of office messages. Note that messages are active from the start date, and up to and including the expire date.
data.EMAIL_TRIPNOTE_NEW_SUCCESS: New Out of office message added
data.EMAIL_TRIPNOTE_DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete the following Out of office message?
data.EMAIL_FORWARD_INTRO: You can forward all your incoming e-mails to another e-mail address. Please note that for security reasons this is not recommended. For more information please see USIT's page about forwarding.
data.EMAIL_FORWARD_NEW_OK: A new forwarding has been made. It normally takes up to 2 hours before changes are applied.
data.EMAIL_FORWARD_DELETE_CONFIRM_INTRO: Are you sure you want to delete your forwarding to {{target}}?
data.EMAIL_FORWARD_ADDLOCAL: Your account is now forwarding all your emails to another email address. Do you want to keep a copy of these emails in this UiO email account?
data.EMAIL_FORWARD_FORM_ADDRESS: Forward all e-mails to this address:
data.EMAIL_FORWARD_FORM_KEEP: Keep a copy of all e-mails in your UiO mailbox
data.EMAIL_FORWARD_FORM_ADDRESS_REQUIRED: Please enter the email address to forward to.
data.GROUPS_EMPTY_MOD_LIST: You have no groups to moderate.
data.GROUPS_TOO_MANY: You are a moderator of too many groups, which would take too long time to load. Please use the command line interface jbofh instead.
data.GROUPS_NO_PERSONAL: You do not have a personal group.
data.GROUPS_PERSONAL_INFO: The personal group is a group with the same name as your user account (in this case {{username}}). You are the administrator of the group and decide who should be members with access to e.g. shared documents or allow execution of scripts.
data.GROUPS_PERSONAL_ALREADY: It looks like you already have a personal group
data.GROUPS_PERSONAL_SUCCESS: Created your personal group. It normally takes up to 2 hours before changes are applied.
data.GROUPS_MEMBERS_DEL_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to remove the following members from the group {{groupname}}?
data.GROUPS_MEMBERS_CHOOSE: Which group do you want to manage?
data.GROUPS_MEMBERS_ADDED_SUCCESS: Added {{no_members}} new members to the group
data.GROUPS_MEMBERS_LIST_EMPTY: This group has currently no members
data.GROUPS_MEMBERS_TOO_MANY: This group has too many members to be shown here. If you know the usernames you could remove them explicitly, or contact your local IT-service.
data.GROUPS_MEMBERS_MORE: To add more members, separate them with spaces and/or commas.
data.GROUPS_MEMBERS_PERSON_OR_ACCOUNT: Obs: persons are only usable in groups for the system Styringskart.
data.GROUPS_NEW_INTRO:
Request a new group for use in IT systems at UiO. The form will be sent to the user administration at UiO, which will decide if the group can be created. You will then be answered by e-mail.

Before filling out this form, please read the guidelines and the help for creating groups.
data.GROUPS_NEW_FORM_DESC_REQUIRED: Need a description of the purpose of the group
data.GROUPS_NEW_FORM_MOD_REQUIRED: Need a group which can moderate the group
data.GUEST_INTRO: Create and manage accounts that give guest access to the UiO wireless network. The accounts are time-limited and can only be used to access the wireless network.
data.GUEST_LIST_ACTIVE_EMPTY: You don't have any active wireless accounts
data.GUEST_NEW_INTRO: Enter the name and cell phone number (note: only Norwegian numbers are allowed). The username and password will be sent to this number.
data.GUEST_NEW_FORM_NOSMS: No – The password will be shown on screen, and you will have the option to print a password page.
data.GUEST_NEW_FORM_SMS: Yes – The password will be sent to the cell phone number you supply.
data.GUEST_NEW_FORM_CONTACT_FMT: Mobile phone number must be eight digits (only Norwegian phone numbers allowed).
data.GUEST_NEW_FORM_NAME_FMT: Name must be at least {{min}} characters, and no more than {{max}} characters.
data.GUEST_CREATED_SMS:
Created new wireless account:
  • Username: {{uname}}
SMS with the username and password was sent to {{mobile}}
data.GUEST_DEACTIVATED: Wireless account with the username {{uname}} successfully closed
data.GUEST_NEW_PASSWORD: Password changed for wireless account {{uname}} – notified {{mobile}} with the new password
data.GUEST_PW_LETTER:
You have now received a new password

If you are unable to login please make sure that Caps Lock is not on and that you are typing the password correctly. Problems with use of new password are often due to users typing 'O' (letter o) instead of '0' (zero) or '1' (number one) instead of 'l' (letter l) or instead of 'I' (letter i). Remember that your new password may not work properly for a few hours!

  • Your user name: {{uname}}
  • Your password: {{password}}

To change your password:

  • Type https://brukerinfo.uio.no/ in the address field of an internet browser
  • Log in with the user name and password from this sheet
  • Go to the tab "Account", and fill out the form with your old and new passords
Your user name and password are strictly personal. You must not allow others to gain access to your password. Violation of these rules will lead to the loss of access to the IT resources at the University of Oslo.

As a user of the IT services provided by the University of Oslo, you have a duty to familiarise yourself with, and abide by the rules and provisions as laid down by the IT Regulations. IT Regulations are available on the World Wide Web, see: https://uio.no/tjenester/it/brukernavn-passord/reglement/english.html

If you experience problems accessing IT services at the University of Oslo please contact local IT support (check https://uio.no/english/services/it/contact/) or call the helpdesk services at the University of Oslo at 22 84 00 04.
data.GUEST_UNKNOWN_USERNAME: No wireless account found with the username {{uname}}.
data.GUEST_CREATE_NO_ACCESS: Only employees have access to create guest users.
